Interpreter of the RodRego register machine.

Interpreter of the RodRego register machine.

program = """
deb 2 2 3
inc 1 1
end
"""


DEBUG = True

prg = [l.split() for l in program.splitlines()]
registers = [0 for _ in range(11)]

registers[0] = 5
registers[1] = 4

IP = 1  # interpretative pointer
while True:
    assert IP < len(prg)

    if DEBUG:
        print('IP = ' + str(IP))
        print(prg[IP])
        print(registers)

    instruc = prg[IP][0]

    if instruc == 'end':
        break

    reg = int(prg[IP][1]) - 1

    if instruc == 'inc':
        registers[reg] += 1
        IP = int(prg[IP][2])

    elif instruc == 'deb':
        if registers[reg] > 0:
            registers[reg] -= 1
            IP = int(prg[IP][2])
        else:
            IP = int(prg[IP][3])
    else:
        print('unknown command: ' + instruc + ' on line ' + str(IP + 1))
        break

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.000 seconds)
